docs.snippet: Joe Pavelski's first goal of the series and sixth of the playoffs sparked the San Jose Sharks to a 3-2 win over the Nashville Predators on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Joe Pavelski's first goal of the series and sixth of the playoffs sparked the San Jose Sharks to a 3-2 win over the Nashville Predators on Sunday.

headline.main: Seattle Police Clash With, Arrest Protesters Following May Day Marches
headline.print_headline: Seattle Police Clash With, Arrest Protesters Following May Day Marches

docs.snippet: Two Seattle police officers were injured and at least seven people arrested on Sunday after a group of unruly demonstrators hurled rocks, bottles and Molotov cocktails and broke windows, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two Seattle police officers were injured and at least seven people arrested on Sunday after a group of unruly demonstrators hurled rocks, bottles and Molotov cocktails and broke windows, authorities said.

headline.main: Raptors Advance After Game 7 Win Over Pacers
headline.print_headline: Raptors Advance After Game 7 Win Over Pacers

docs.snippet: DeMar DeRozan scored 30 points and the Toronto Raptors defeated the Indiana Pacers 89-84 in the seventh game of their first-round Eastern Conference playoff series Sunday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: DeMar DeRozan scored 30 points and the Toronto Raptors defeated the Indiana Pacers 89-84 in the seventh game of their first-round Eastern Conference playoff series Sunday night.

headline.main: Dos Santos Stays Hot as Galaxy Plays Sporting KC to 1-1 Draw

headline.main: Sick-Out by Detroit Teachers Prompts 43 School Closures
headline.print_headline: Sick-Out by Detroit Teachers Prompts 43 School Closures

docs.snippet: More than 40 Detroit Public Schools will be closed Monday, the district said, after the teachers union urged members to call in sick in a protest over funding issues....
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 40 Detroit Public Schools will be closed Monday, the district said, after the teachers union urged members to call in sick in a protest over funding issues.
